title: Business & Finance
text:
U.S. stocks rose, with the S&P 500 and Nasdaq gaining 0.4% and 0.6%, respectively, to records and the Dow adding 0.3%.

---

LVMH has instructed corporate staff at jeweler Tiffany to return to the office two days a week beginning March 1.

---

The CFPB is probing the way that digital money-transfer service Venmo treats customers who the company says owe it money for transactions that went awry.

---

Boeing 's newest jetliner is becoming its latest big problem, complicating the plane maker's efforts to navigate the pandemic.

---

Fox Corp .'s Fox Business has canceled "Lou Dobbs Tonight," one of the channel's consistently highest-rated shows.

---

Bill Gates's Cascade Investment agreed to team up with Blackstone and GIP in a $4.7 billion deal for Signature Aviation.
